MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL15 postcode area of Ruthin, affecting properties in Lon Parcwr Industrial Estate and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3.30PM due to a safety concern on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5.45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.45PM on 21st January 2021.
